item.title: Life’s too short to not do what you love
item.description:
Life’s too short to not do what you love

When we were kids, we believed we could be anything. We had dreams of being cowboys and presidents and astronauts – andwe weren’t afraid of telling anyone. We colored, sang, danced, and we didn’t worry what other thought.We showed the world who we were – our full selves, with all our dreams, faults and quirks.
